original_text: David answered Recab and his brother Baanah, the sons of Rimmon from Beeroth. He said to them, ‘The Lord has rescued me from all my troubles. So I tell you this, as surely as the Lord lives:
korean_text: 다윗이 브에롯 사람 림몬의 아들 레갑과 그의 형제 바아나에게 대답하여 그들에게 이르되 내 생명을 여러 환난 가운데서 건지신 여호와께서 살아 계심을 두고 맹세하노니

sentences.original_text: David answered Recab and his brother Baanah
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗이 레갑과 그의 형제 바아나에게 대답하였다

sentences.original_text: the sons of Rimmon from Beeroth
The Lord has rescued me from all my troubles
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 나를 나의 모든 환난에서 구원하셨다

sentences.original_text: as surely as the Lord lives
